name: Loot Everything
description:
Loot Everything is a game in which, you guessed it, you loot everything.
The game was my final project for 3D Game Development. In Loot Everything, your goal is to solve puzzles and to loot all the chests that you can find in the game. There are a couple of hidden areas in the game as well.
For this game, I ended up texturing nearly all of the environmental assets (Floor, walls, stairs, and so on).
